Content.Text:
<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. You look fine
as usual, today.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, <MYNAME>. What can I do for you this
morning?

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. I look sleepy?
Mornings are tough for me.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Say, <MYNAME>, I wish you'd be my guinea
pig sometimes. You don't have to worry
about me messing up!
<PAGE>
<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>I think. Hee hee.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Ugh, I'm hungry.
<PAGE>
<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>Hey, <MYNAME>! Bring me some of your home
cooking.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Boring, it's boring here. <MYNAME>,
perform something for me. I hate being
bored.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Okay, it's my time! I love the night! I
have so much energy.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, hey, <MYNAME>. Snap out of it! And
stand up straight.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good evening, <MYNAME>. What're you doing
up at this hour? Is the farm work done?

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, <MYNAME>. What brings you to my place
so early in the morning? I like your
ambition.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. When I look at
your face, <MYNAME>, I perk up. Isn't
that strange?

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You're so energetic, <MYNAME>. Looking
at you makes me cheerful. Hee hee.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hello, <MYNAME>. You're a little late,
aren't you? Well, never mind.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hee hee, <MYNAME>. You came to see me,
after all. Just as I predicted.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
If I don't see you, <MYNAME>, my day
just doesn't seem to start. Isn't that
strange?

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good evening, <MYNAME>. How is the farm
doing? Shall I use my magic to help you
out?

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, you're working hard again today.
Good for you.
<PAGE>
Work just as hard tomorrow, and you'll
see the results.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
What will the townspeople say when they
see you meeting me, <MYNAME>?
<PAGE>
<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>What? You don't care? If you say so, 
<MYNAME>, it's fine with me.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Tell me, <MYNAME>, why is there such
a thing as morning?
<PAGE>
<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>Oh, I'm so sleepy. Boy, this upsets me!
Really!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. I got up the same
time as you, <MYNAME>, and it's so
early, I'm still sleepy.
<PAGE>
<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Okay, go to work. Leave the housework to
me. I'll use my magic and finish it in
a jiffy.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. You're happy 'cuz
I'm here?
<PAGE>
<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>Don't be silly! What a thing to say
first thing in the morning!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You're such a hard worker, <MYNAME>.
I can't help but admire you.
<PAGE>
<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>I've had a long life, but someone like
you is rare indeed, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
I don't cook too much. You're a better
cook, <MYNAME>, so I don't know what to
prepare.
<PAGE>
<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>What? You like my cooking? R-Really?
Then I'll do my best.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's almost time to turn in. You looked
so busy today, I didn't want to call
out to you.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You must be tired, <MYNAME>. Drink this
medicine I made.
<PAGE>
<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>What are you afraid of? There's nothing
weird in it. Hee hee.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I met with the Harvest Goddess today. 
You want to know why?
<PAGE>
<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Well, I got married, didn't I? I wanted
to see if she was jealous. Tee hee.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Oh, it's you, <MYNAME>. It's a nice day.
I don't feel too well. I prefer bad
weather days.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, <MYNAME>. It's raining. Spring
rain is nice and clammy.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
It's hot...Do something. It's just the
Harvest Goddess being mean and keeping
the weather clear.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Mmmm, it's nice and cool. Summertime
needs rain, otherwise it's too hot to
bear.
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, you prefer rain on the farm
too, right?

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
<MYNAME>, if the weather stays this
clear, autumn will be ruined.
<PAGE>
I wish it would rain. Maybe I'll use my
magic.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, <MYNAME>, isn't the town lovely
when it rains?
<PAGE>
It feels so damp, like mushrooms are 
going to grow. Hee hee.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Oh, <MYNAME>! Why isn't it snowing?!
<PAGE>
Winter means snow! Doesn't the Harvest
Goddess understand that?!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, <MYNAME>. See? When it snows, it feels
like winter. My bears are overjoyed.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
I love it when the weather is bad, but
this is too much! The Harvest
Goddess must be up to her old tricks!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
I said I wanted it to snow, but why
so much? I just know it's to spite me.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Grrr! That Harvest Goddess! How dare she
stand in your way, <MYNAME>?! How
are you supposed to get any work done?!
<PAGE>
I'm going to go give her a piece of my
mind!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
That Harvest Goddess! Does she want
to ruin our livelihood, <MYNAME>?
<PAGE>
It's snowing so much, we can't even
work. She's must be jealous of us, I'm
sure.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, <MYNAME>. I see that you've found
a sweetheart? I know everything.
<PAGE>
<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH><MYNAME>, you're so cocky. I'm going to
pinch your cheek! There! Anyway, do your
best and don't get jilted!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The forest has lots of ingredients to
make medicine. Huh? What kind of
medicine?
<PAGE>
Well, all kinds. Would you like to try
sometime?

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The forest is so quiet and nice. This
is like the place I used to live.
<PAGE>
<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Where did I live before? It's a secret.
A woman has lots of secrets.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
There are many animals here. I wonder
if there are bears! Let me know if
you see one.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
I can feel the Harvest Goddess' power in
this forest. It's annoying, but without
it, this forest wouldn't be so lush.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Let me guess, the Harvest Goddess lives
there, right? Again she lives in a pool
of water. She's so predictable. 
<PAGE>
She should really think harder about
where she chooses to live. Doesn't she
get bored? She should learn from me.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, that's right. The Harvest Sprites
live with the Harvest Goddess, right?
<PAGE>
Were there two Harvest Sprites? I'll bet
the Harvest Goddess makes them work like
slaves. She's so selfish.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Will you share your livestock and crops
with me? For my experiments, of course.
Why are you giving me that look?
<PAGE>
<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>How rude. I won't do anything weird to
them. Hee hee.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It takes quite a bit of time to grow
crops on your farm, doesn't it?
<PAGE>
My herbs grow so fast. But I guess they
also wilt pretty fast too...

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Mines are fun. It's dark, quiet, and
damp. Of all the places around town,
this is where I feel most at peace.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The ore in the mines here are pretty
high quality. It's handy because I use
a lot in my experiments.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This town is so lively. Just how many
people live here anyway? Do you know,
<MYNAME>?

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I don't like it when it's too lively.
But it's not bad in this town.
<PAGE>
Well, if I've come to feel this way,
that means the town must have
gotten much better.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's right. I visited this town on
vacation once. Dunhill must've been
about five years old.
<PAGE>
I just came that one time, so no one
would remember me.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Oh, I wish someone would be a test
subject for my potion. Like someone
who runs a farm...
<PAGE>
<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>Don't worry. My potions may fail once
in a while, but they're safe. Why are
you so afraid?

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Huh? You want to learn magic? Well,
it takes about 300 years of training.
<PAGE>
<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>Why that look? Isn't it common sense?
It's not easy to learn. Understand?

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Do I know the Harvest Goddess?
I certainly do! She's my lifelong
rival!
<PAGE>
It irks me to no end to hear her being
called a Goddess. You'd be shocked
if you knew her true self!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
How can I make trouble for the Harvest
Goddess? Hmm...maybe I'll put something
nasty in her spring.
<PAGE>
<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Yes, that's it! I can just picture the
Goddess' shocked face. Heh heh...

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Everyone in my family is a witch. But
apparently I've got unique powers.
<PAGE>
So everyone looks up to me. You should
feel honored that you're even
speaking to someone like me.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
It's so much fun when I'm with you,
<MYNAME>. I want you by my side from
now on.
<PAGE>
If you'll stay by me, you'll have to 
take a potion for immortality though.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
When I talk to you I get so irritated,
<MYNAME>.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Say...can you at least look like you're
having fun?
<PAGE>
<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>You're with me, got it? There's no way
you're not having a good time.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You're so lucky to be able to date me.
You should feel thankful.
<PAGE>
<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Yes, yes...as long as you understand.
Hee hee.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Do you know what the Harvest
Goddess said when I told her I have
a boyfriend?
<PAGE>
"I do not approve!" Isn't she
pathetic? Well, it serves her right!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm overflowing with magical powers
lately. This has never happened before.
<PAGE>
<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>I think it's because I'm with you,
<MYNAME>.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I've lived for a long time, but I've
never met anyone like you, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
I mean, you never complain and you
continue to stick with me. I'm grateful.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
I'm thinking it's about time for that
human custom? No?
<PAGE>
<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Are you listening? Hurry up and hand
it over. I don't like to wait.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Sigh... You're in the way there.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Do you have a complaint? Just say it.
You don't even want to talk about it, 
then?

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
<MYNAME>, I thought I married an honest
man. Listen to me.
<PAGE>
<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>I have more experience in life than
you. So just listen to me. Understand?

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's nice to have family in a home. I
had my bear until now, but she
certainly was no conversationalist.
<PAGE>
<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Lately, I think it's a good thing I got
married, or not...

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Okay, I think I'll concoct some potions.
Any requests?
<PAGE>
<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Something to make everyone happy? I'm
not sure, but I'll try.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I never imagined living like this.
<PAGE>
I mean, a witch becoming a wife? That's
like a dream. I'm grateful.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
When a witch falls in love, her magical
powers can do amazing things.
<PAGE>
I feel like I can do anything now. How
about I test my powers and conquer the
world? Just joking. Hee hee.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Go out with you? W-What? You're 
blushing. Huh? M-Me too?
<PAGE>
Th-That's ridiculous. You're just
imagining it. Really. Just say that
you're imagining it.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Don't worry about it, <MYNAME>. We're just
back to where we were before.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I'm so glad I have magical powers. Oh,
you want to know what I'm talking
about?
<PAGE>
I didn't want our relationship to stay
like this, so I used some magic. Oh,
don't worry.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Marriage... I always wanted to
experience it once in my life.
<PAGE>
But as the day nears, I feel so
nervous. Oh, do something!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Is this being a newlywed? I feel so
nervous every day. I'd better take some
medicine to calm me down.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm pregnant... It hasn't sunk in yet.
<PAGE>
<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>My own baby... Does that mean she'll be
able to use magic too?

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Hmm...My tummy is getting bigger. It's
hard to work too.
<PAGE>
<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>Don't worry. I'll take it easy. Well,
if I ever need to, I have a potion to
make me lighter. So I'm fine.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I used my magic to check, and it looks
like the baby will be born soon. A
boy or girl?
<PAGE>
<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Hmm, I wonder which? I know, but I'm not
telling. It's more fun to be surprised,
right?

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<CHILD_NAME> doesn't seem to have magic
powers. Must take after you, <MYNAME>?
Maybe that's for the best.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Our child moves around so much. Just
like you, <MYNAME>. Take your eyes away
for a minute and poof. Gone.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<CHILD_NAME> is growing up nicely. With a
mom like me that's to be expected.
<PAGE>
<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>Why that look? You got something to say?

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
If you want <CHILD_NAME> to grow up
into an adult, leave it to me.
<PAGE>
I'm concocting a nice potion now that
will cause an amazing transformation!
<PAGE>
<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>Nah, just joking. I'll have more fun
with you as my plaything, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Is that grape juice you've got there?
I was just craving some.
<PAGE>
It looks delicious! It's my favorite!
Thank you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
That's for me? Thank you. I love it!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
You're so thoughtful, <MYNAME>. I bet
you get that all the time, don't you?

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I wonder if this is the one the Harvest
Goddess wanted? Perfect. I'll chuck
it in the spring later.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Say, <MYNAME>, what were you thinking? I
don't want something like this.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
What is this? I don't want it. H-Hey,
take it away. I really don't want it!!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What? Look at the size. I've never seen 
one this big. How unusual.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Huh? What's with this size?!
<PAGE>
<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>You grew it on the farm? Wow, I've never
seen one this huge. I'll display it.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
No thanks. Didn't you hear me? I don't
want it now.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Hmm, not now. Save it for next time.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Sorry, I don't want it now. Put it in
the Harvest Goddess' spring or
something.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Huh? There's more? I appreciate the
thought, but how about giving it to me
another time?

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thank you. But you really don't have
to. Please take this home.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's enough. If you give me so many
gifts, how can I appreciate them? Save
them for another time.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Uh, what's this? My birthday? Oh, come
to think of it, you're right! I
completely forgot!
<PAGE>
Grape juice? What a great choice. I 
really must commend you.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Birthday? Whose? Oh, it's my birthday,
isn't it? I'm surprised you remembered.
<PAGE>
A present for me? Hee hee. That makes 
me so happy.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
My birthday? Oh, you're right.
<PAGE>
A present for me? Hee hee, that makes
me so happy.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A birthday present? For me? Thank you,
<MYNAME>.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Say, are you serious? I mean, it's my
birthday. You call this a present?

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Sigh... Listen, why would anyone want
to receive a present like this?

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Really! How ridiculous!
<PAGE>
Age means nothing to me, but to
get a gift like this... I'll just toss
it into the Harvest Goddess' spring!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I never expected something this big for
my birthday. Thank you.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's huge. I never expected something
this big for my birthday.
<PAGE>
<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>Where shall I put it? Hmm...

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
She's going to turn into that bird,
right? They look so different when
they're babies.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Actually, she's quite cute. Her face
has personality.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Wow! How do you make her grow so big?
Did you use magic?

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Stop yapping so much. Why must it bark
like that?

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
How can you work on a farm when you're
so fat? You can't, right? Well then,
go on a diet.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
H-Hey...don't bark so loud. You're
being over-protective...

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
You have no discipline, getting this
fat. Shame on you. You have to make
sure to run and get some exercise!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hmm, the cat is cute. I just love how
aloof it is, just like me.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh dear, look how cute and fat it is.
Such a round tummy.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
She has such beautiful fur. I like it.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
She's like a mochi rice cake, and so
therapeutic.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The Flower Festival? What's that?
Well, never mind. Thanks.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
A present for the Flower Festival?
I'm not sure I understand, but
this is for me?
<PAGE>
<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>Humans have nice traditions once in a
while. I gratefully accept.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Oh, a present for the Flower Festival? I
wasn't interested before we got married,
but it's different now.
<PAGE>
I love receiving flowers on a special
day.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
So this is what you give for Harmony
Day? Thank you, I'll take it.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This is for me? A Spring Harmony Day
present?
<PAGE>
<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>Who said I didn't want it? Hurry and
give it to me!
<PAGE>
<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Mmmm, it's good. It's filled with love
and it's delicious.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
For me? Hee hee, thank you. I was
looking forward to this day.
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, anything you make is bound to
taste good.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Candy for the Pumpkin Festival? Don't
you give these to children?
<PAGE>
<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>I may look like this, but I'm way older
than you. But I don't want it to go to
waste, so I'll take it.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh? You're giving me candy? Don't you
give these to children?
<PAGE>
<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>I look so young, I guess it's not
strange. I'll take it, thank you.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Candy for me? Today is the Pumpkin
Festival, right?
<PAGE>
Hee hee, I have to stay young forever.
Thank you.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
I've seen this somewhere before. Hmm...
What is this?

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Umm, what? I know you're impatient, but
there's a procedure to things.
<PAGE>
<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>Get this. Don't be hasty. Be more aware
of the time and place.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hee hee. I've been waiting, <MYNAME>.
Hey, wait.
<PAGE>
<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>If the Harvest Goddess finds us here, I
just know she'll make fun. 
<PAGE>
Let's change venues. Let's go this way.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Huh? A blue feather? Are you supposed
to show this over and over again? I
already gave you my answer.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ahh, a blue feather. That takes me back
to when you proposed. But why are you
holding it now?

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Sit there, <MYNAME>. Just sit, right
now!
<PAGE>
Listen. Why did you try to give someone
else the blue feather? I can see with
my magic.
<PAGE>
I will forgive you this time, but next
time, I'll turn you to stone!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A ring... These things are meaningless
unless they have magical powers. This is
a just a regular ring, right?

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Was that the intention behind showing
this to me, <MYNAME>?
<PAGE>
<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>S-Stupid! How can you say that with a
